rules: Rule1: Provided that legislation l1 is enacted, facility f1 is approved.
Rule2: Either legislation l1 is enacted or legislation l1 is amended.
Rule3: Under the condition that drug d1 is approved, drug d1 is recalled.
Rule4: If financial product p1 is subsidized, then facility f1 is eligible.
Rule5: Financial product p1 is subsidized or financial product p1 is covered.
Rule6: Given that financial product p1 is covered, drug d1 is approved.
Rule7: Provided that facility f1 is eligible, drug d1 is approved.
Rule8: Either facility f1 has a violation or facility f1 is inspected.
Rule9: Under the condition that facility f1 is inspected, facility f1 is not approved.
Rule10: Whenever facility f1 is fined, facility f1 is not approved.
Rule11: If notice n1 is issued, then, in the event that it is not the case that if facility f1 has a violation then facility f1 is fined, violation v1 is appealed.
Rule12: Either facility f1 is compliant or notice n1 is issued.
Rule13: If facility f1 is approved, then facility f1 produces drug d1.
Rule14: If notice n1 is upheld, then facility f1 is not compliant.
Rule15: Whenever facility f1 is suspended, it is not the case that facility f1 is approved.
Rule16: Provided that license l1 is revoked, facility f1 is not active.
Rule17: In the case that license l1 is suspended, facility f1 is not active.
Rule18: If facility f1 fails inspection, then license l1 is revoked.
Rule19: Facility f1 fails inspection or facility f1 receives a warning.
Rule20: Whenever facility f1 receives a citation, license l1 is suspended.
Rule21: Either legislation l1 requires a license or, if facility f1 is approved then facility f1 operates.
Rule22: Under the condition that drug d1 is scheduled, it is not the case that substance s1 is controlled.
Rule23: Drug d1 is scheduled or legislation l1 does not require a license.
Rule24: If legislation l1 mandates testing, then, provided that drug d1 is scheduled, substance s1 is controlled.
Rule25: Whenever drug d1 is recalled, facility f1 does not produce drug d1.
Rule26: If it is not the case that if notice n1 is reviewed then notice n1 is upheld, then notice n1 is contested.
Rule27: Provided that it is not the case that if notice n1 is reviewed then notice n1 is upheld, notice n1 is not contested.
Rule28: Under the condition that it is not the case that if facility f1 receives a warning then facility f1 receives a citation, penalty p1 is waived.
Rule29: If it is not the case that if facility f1 receives a warning then facility f1 receives a citation, then penalty p1 is not waived.
Rule30: In the case that facility f1 is not suspended, facility f1 is active.
facts: Fact3: Violation v1 is not appealed.
Fact4: Facility f1 does not operate.
